SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rnum, FLOOR((ROWNUM - 1) /#{rows} + 1) pageNumber FROM ( SELECT USER_EMAIL , USER_PASSWORD , USER_NICKNAME , USER_AUTH , USER_DELFLAG , USER_EMAILCHK , USER_ISWRITE FROM LPUSER WHERE 1=1
AND USER_EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{input}||'%'
AND USER_NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{input}||'%'
ORDER BY USER_NICKNAME ) a ) a WHERE a.pageNumber = #{page} order by a.rnum

SELECT count(*) totalTotCnt ,CEIL(count(*) / #{rows}) totalPage FROM LPUSER
WHERE USER_EMAIL LIKE '%'||#{input}||'%' OR USER_NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{input}||'%'
ORDER BY USER_NICKNAME
